WITH LOCALRC AS ( --지방경정 SELECT RCDATE, DECODE(BRANCHCD,'001','201','002','202') BRANCHCD, '4', SUM(PAID)*1500, SUM(PAID) CNT FROM CCRC.VIEW_BOAT_ENTER@CCRCLINK WHERE RCDATE BETWEEN ? AND ? GROUP BY RCDATE, BRANCHCD UNION ALL SELECT RACEDATE, DECODE(BRANCHCD, '101','203', '201','204','301','205') BRANCHCD, '4', SUM(ENTNUM_FEE)*1500, SUM(ENTNUM_FEE) CNT FROM BCRC.VW_INWON@BCRCDBLINK WHERE CYCLECD = '099' AND RACEDATE BETWEEN ? AND ? GROUP BY RACEDATE, BRANCHCD UNION ALL SELECT RACEDATE, DECODE(BRANCHCD, '101','203', '201','204','301','205') BRANCHCD, '5', 0, SUM(ENTNUM_FREE) CNT FROM BCRC.VW_INWON@BCRCDBLINK WHERE CYCLECD = '099' AND RACEDATE BETWEEN ? AND ? GROUP BY RACEDATE, BRANCHCD ) --, FIXED_SEAT AS ( --지정좌석실 --SELECT ISSUE_DT --,COMM_NO --,'4' --,COUNT(*) * 1500 AS AMT --,COUNT(*) AS CNT --FROM TBRC_FS_TRADE --WHERE 1=1 --AND ((COMM_NO = '21' AND ISSUE_DT < '20161014') --영등포지점 20161014 이후 티머니에 포함 --OR --(COMM_NO = '26' AND ISSUE_DT < '20161012')) --천안지점 20161012 이후 티머니에 포함 --GROUP BY ISSUE_DT, COMM_NO --) , FIXED_SEAT AS ( --지정좌석실 SELECT ISSUE_DT, COMM_NO, '4', AMT, CNT FROM ( SELECT ISSUE_DT, COMM_NO, '4', SUM(AMOUNT) AS AMT, COUNT(SEQ_NO) AS CNT FROM TBRC_FS_TRADE --지정좌석실 WHERE ISSUE_DT BETWEEN ? AND ? GROUP BY ISSUE_DT, COMM_NO UNION ALL SELECT ISSUE_DT, '00' COMM_NO, '4', SUM(AMOUNT) AS AMT, SUM(QTY) CNT FROM TBRC_FS_TRADE_KM --지정좌석실광명 WHERE ISSUE_DT BETWEEN ? AND ? GROUP BY ISSUE_DT UNION ALL SELECT /* 경주사업 지정좌석관리(대전, 올림픽지점) */ SALES_DT AS ISSUE_DT, BRNC_CD COMM_NO, '4', SUM(DECODE(REFUND_YN, 'N', SAVE_AMT)) AS AMT, SUM(CASE WHEN REFUND_YN = 'N' THEN 1 ELSE 0 END) CNT FROM TBRB_APPO_SEAT_MANA WHERE SALES_DT BETWEEN ? AND ? GROUP BY SALES_DT, BRNC_CD ) )
SELECT /* rem4030_s01 */ COMM_NO ,C.CD_NM AS COMM_NM ,SUM(CNT_SUM) AS CNT_SUM ,SUM(PAY_CNT) AS PAY_CNT ,SUM(NOT_PAY_CNT) AS NOT_PAY_CNT ,SUM(REQUEST_FEE) AS REQUEST_FEE ,SUM(SUPY_AMT) AS SUPY_AMT ,SUM(ADD_TAX) AS ADD_TAX ,SUM(PRV_WST_TAX) AS PRV_WST_TAX ,SUM(EDU_TAX) AS EDU_TAX FROM ( --2014년 이전 개별소비세(200원), 교육세(60원) : 본장, 지점 동일 SELECT COMM_NO ,CNT_SUM ,PAY_CNT ,NOT_PAY_CNT ,REQUEST_FEE ,ROUND(REQUEST_FEE/1.1) SUPY_AMT ,(REQUEST_FEE - ROUND(REQUEST_FEE/1.1)) ADD_TAX ,CNT_SUM * 200 AS PRV_WST_TAX ,CNT_SUM * 60 AS EDU_TAX FROM ( SELECT COMM_NO ,SUM(CNT) AS CNT_SUM ,SUM(DECODE(CARD_USER_TYPE, '4', CNT, 0)) AS PAY_CNT ,SUM(DECODE(CARD_USER_TYPE, '4', 0, CNT)) AS NOT_PAY_CNT ,SUM(DECODE(CARD_USER_TYPE, '4', FEE, 0)) AS REQUEST_FEE FROM ( SELECT TRADE_DATE ,COMM_NO ,CARD_USER_TYPE ,FEE ,CNT FROM TBRC_T_TRADE_SUM UNION ALL SELECT TRADE_DATE ,'00' ,DECODE(FEE,0,'1','4') ,FEE ,CNT FROM TBRC_T_TRADE_KM_SUM WHERE 'N' = ? UNION ALL SELECT * FROM FIXED_SEAT WHERE 'Y' = ? UNION ALL SELECT * FROM LOCALRC WHERE 'Y' = ? --지방경정포함여부 ) T, ( SELECT RACE_DAY ,C.CD AS BRNC_CD ,C.CD_NM AS COMM_NM ,S.MEET_CD FROM (SELECT RACE_DAY, MIN(MEET_CD) AS MEET_CD FROM VW_SDL_INFO GROUP BY RACE_DAY) S, TBRK_SPEC_CD C WHERE 1=1 AND S.MEET_CD LIKE ? || '%' AND C.GRP_CD = '018' AND C.DEL_YN = 'N' AND C.CD_TERM4 LIKE DECODE(S.MEET_CD, '001','1','%')||DECODE(S.MEET_CD, '003','1','%') AND S.RACE_DAY < '20140101' ) S WHERE S.RACE_DAY = T.TRADE_DATE AND S.BRNC_CD = T.COMM_NO AND T.COMM_NO <> DECODE( ?, '1', DECODE(S.MEET_CD,'001','00','98') ,'-') --경륜이면 00, 경정이면 98 제외 20150115 김수정 요청 AND T.TRADE_DATE BETWEEN ? AND ? GROUP BY COMM_NO) UNION ALL --2014 ~ 2015년 개별소비세(400원), 교육세(120원): 본장, 지점 동일 SELECT COMM_NO ,CNT_SUM ,PAY_CNT ,NOT_PAY_CNT ,REQUEST_FEE ,ROUND(REQUEST_FEE/1.1) SUPY_AMT ,(REQUEST_FEE - ROUND(REQUEST_FEE/1.1)) ADD_TAX ,CNT_SUM * 400 AS PRV_WST_TAX ,CNT_SUM * 120 AS EDU_TAX FROM ( SELECT COMM_NO ,SUM(CNT) AS CNT_SUM ,SUM(DECODE(CARD_USER_TYPE, '4', CNT, 0)) AS PAY_CNT ,SUM(DECODE(CARD_USER_TYPE, '4', 0, CNT)) AS NOT_PAY_CNT ,SUM(DECODE(CARD_USER_TYPE, '4', FEE, 0)) AS REQUEST_FEE FROM ( SELECT TRADE_DATE ,COMM_NO ,CARD_USER_TYPE ,FEE ,CNT FROM TBRC_T_TRADE_SUM UNION ALL SELECT TRADE_DATE ,'00' ,DECODE(FEE,0,'1','4') ,FEE ,CNT FROM TBRC_T_TRADE_KM_SUM WHERE 'N' = ? UNION ALL SELECT * FROM FIXED_SEAT WHERE 'Y' = ? UNION ALL SELECT * FROM LOCALRC WHERE 'Y' = ? --지방경정포함여부 ) T, ( SELECT RACE_DAY ,C.CD AS BRNC_CD ,C.CD_NM AS COMM_NM ,S.MEET_CD FROM (SELECT RACE_DAY, MIN(MEET_CD) AS MEET_CD FROM VW_SDL_INFO GROUP BY RACE_DAY) S, TBRK_SPEC_CD C WHERE 1=1 AND S.MEET_CD LIKE ? || '%' AND C.GRP_CD = '018' AND C.DEL_YN = 'N' AND C.CD_TERM4 LIKE DECODE(S.MEET_CD, '001','1','%')||DECODE(S.MEET_CD, '003','1','%') AND S.RACE_DAY BETWEEN '20140101' AND '20151231' ) S WHERE S.RACE_DAY = T.TRADE_DATE AND S.BRNC_CD = T.COMM_NO AND T.COMM_NO <> DECODE( ?, '1', DECODE(S.MEET_CD,'001','00','98') ,'-') --경륜이면 00, 경정이면 98 제외 20150115 김수정 요청 AND T.TRADE_DATE BETWEEN ? AND ? GROUP BY COMM_NO) UNION ALL --2016년 이후 지점 : 개별소비세(800원), 교육세(240원), 본장제외 SELECT COMM_NO ,CNT_SUM ,PAY_CNT ,NOT_PAY_CNT ,REQUEST_FEE ,ROUND(REQUEST_FEE/1.1) SUPY_AMT ,(REQUEST_FEE - ROUND(REQUEST_FEE/1.1)) ADD_TAX ,CNT_SUM * 800 AS PRV_WST_TAX ,CNT_SUM * 240 AS EDU_TAX FROM ( SELECT COMM_NO ,SUM(CNT) AS CNT_SUM ,SUM(DECODE(CARD_USER_TYPE, '4', CNT, 0)) AS PAY_CNT ,SUM(DECODE(CARD_USER_TYPE, '4', 0, CNT)) AS NOT_PAY_CNT ,SUM(DECODE(CARD_USER_TYPE, '4', FEE, 0)) AS REQUEST_FEE FROM ( SELECT TRADE_DATE ,COMM_NO ,CARD_USER_TYPE ,FEE ,CNT FROM TBRC_T_TRADE_SUM UNION ALL SELECT * FROM FIXED_SEAT WHERE 'Y' = ? UNION ALL SELECT * FROM LOCALRC WHERE 'Y' = ? --지방경정포함여부 ) T, ( SELECT RACE_DAY, BRNC_CD, COMM_NM, MEET_CD FROM ( SELECT RACE_DAY ,C.CD AS BRNC_CD ,C.CD_NM AS COMM_NM ,DECODE(S.MEET_CD, '002', '001', '004', '001', S.MEET_CD) MEET_CD FROM (SELECT RACE_DAY, MIN(MEET_CD) AS MEET_CD FROM VW_SDL_INFO GROUP BY RACE_DAY) S, TBRK_SPEC_CD C WHERE 1=1 AND S.MEET_CD LIKE ? || '%' AND C.GRP_CD = '018' AND C.DEL_YN = 'N' AND C.CD_TERM4 LIKE DECODE(S.MEET_CD, '001','1','%')||DECODE(S.MEET_CD, '003','1','%') AND S.RACE_DAY > '20160101' UNION ALL SELECT RACE_DAY -- 휴장기 교차경주 처리 ,C.CD AS BRNC_CD ,C.CD_NM AS COMM_NM ,'001' MEET_CD FROM (SELECT RACE_DAY, MIN(MEET_CD) AS MEET_CD FROM VW_SDL_INFO GROUP BY RACE_DAY) S, TBRK_SPEC_CD C WHERE 1=1 AND S.MEET_CD IN ('002','004') AND DECODE(?,'001',1,2) = 1 --경륜일 경우만 조회 AND C.GRP_CD = '018' AND C.DEL_YN = 'N' AND C.CD_TERM4 LIKE DECODE(S.MEET_CD, '001','1','%')||DECODE(S.MEET_CD, '003','1','%') AND S.RACE_DAY IN (SELECT CD FROM TBRK_SPEC_CD WHERE GRP_CD = '175') ) GROUP BY RACE_DAY, BRNC_CD, COMM_NM, MEET_CD ) S WHERE S.RACE_DAY = T.TRADE_DATE AND S.BRNC_CD = T.COMM_NO AND T.COMM_NO NOT IN ('00', '98') AND T.TRADE_DATE BETWEEN ? AND ? GROUP BY COMM_NO) UNION ALL --2016년 이후 본장 : 개별소비세(400원), 교육세(120원), 지점제외 SELECT COMM_NO ,CNT_SUM ,PAY_CNT ,NOT_PAY_CNT ,REQUEST_FEE ,ROUND(REQUEST_FEE/1.1) SUPY_AMT ,(REQUEST_FEE - ROUND(REQUEST_FEE/1.1)) ADD_TAX ,CNT_SUM * 400 AS PRV_WST_TAX ,CNT_SUM * 120 AS EDU_TAX FROM ( SELECT COMM_NO ,SUM(CNT) AS CNT_SUM ,SUM(DECODE(CARD_USER_TYPE, '4', CNT, 0)) AS PAY_CNT ,SUM(DECODE(CARD_USER_TYPE, '4', 0, CNT)) AS NOT_PAY_CNT ,SUM(DECODE(CARD_USER_TYPE, '4', FEE, 0)) AS REQUEST_FEE FROM ( SELECT TRADE_DATE ,COMM_NO ,CARD_USER_TYPE ,FEE ,CNT FROM TBRC_T_TRADE_SUM UNION ALL SELECT TRADE_DATE ,'00' ,DECODE(FEE,0,'1','4') ,FEE ,CNT FROM TBRC_T_TRADE_KM_SUM WHERE 'N' = ? UNION ALL SELECT TRADE_DATE ,'98' ,DECODE(FEE,0,'1','4') ,FEE ,CNT FROM TBRC_T_TRADE_MSR_SUM WHERE 'N' = ? UNION ALL SELECT * FROM FIXED_SEAT WHERE 'Y' = ? UNION ALL SELECT * FROM LOCALRC WHERE 'Y' = ? --지방경정포함여부 ) T, ( SELECT RACE_DAY, BRNC_CD, COMM_NM, MEET_CD FROM ( SELECT RACE_DAY ,C.CD AS BRNC_CD ,C.CD_NM AS COMM_NM ,DECODE(S.MEET_CD, '002', '001', '004', '001', S.MEET_CD) MEET_CD FROM (SELECT RACE_DAY, MIN(MEET_CD) AS MEET_CD FROM VW_SDL_INFO GROUP BY RACE_DAY) S, TBRK_SPEC_CD C WHERE 1=1 AND S.MEET_CD LIKE ? || '%' AND C.GRP_CD = '018' AND C.DEL_YN = 'N' AND C.CD_TERM4 LIKE DECODE(S.MEET_CD, '001','1','%')||DECODE(S.MEET_CD, '003','1','%') AND S.RACE_DAY > '20160101' UNION ALL SELECT RACE_DAY -- 휴장기 교차경주 처리 ,C.CD AS BRNC_CD ,C.CD_NM AS COMM_NM ,'001' MEET_CD FROM (SELECT RACE_DAY, MIN(MEET_CD) AS MEET_CD FROM VW_SDL_INFO GROUP BY RACE_DAY) S, TBRK_SPEC_CD C WHERE 1=1 AND S.MEET_CD IN ('002','004') AND DECODE(?,'001',1,2) = 1 --경륜일 경우만 조회 AND C.GRP_CD = '018' AND C.DEL_YN = 'N' AND C.CD_TERM4 LIKE DECODE(S.MEET_CD, '001','1','%')||DECODE(S.MEET_CD, '003','1','%') AND S.RACE_DAY IN (SELECT CD FROM TBRK_SPEC_CD WHERE GRP_CD = '175') ) GROUP BY RACE_DAY, BRNC_CD, COMM_NM, MEET_CD ) S WHERE S.RACE_DAY = T.TRADE_DATE AND S.BRNC_CD = T.COMM_NO AND T.COMM_NO IN ('00', '98') AND T.COMM_NO <> DECODE( ?, '1', DECODE(S.MEET_CD,'001','00','98') ,'-') --경륜이면 00, 경정이면 98 제외 20150115 김수정 요청 AND T.TRADE_DATE BETWEEN ? AND ? GROUP BY COMM_NO) ) A, TBRK_SPEC_CD C WHERE A.COMM_NO = C.CD(+) AND C.GRP_CD(+) ='018' GROUP BY C.ORD_NO, COMM_NO, C.CD_NM ORDER BY C.ORD_NO, COMM_NO
